response.overview: In the heart of Bay Ridge, Ray McAuliffe, grappling with the recent loss of all his grandparents, finds himself drifting away from the mundane routines and drinking culture of his hometown. As he distances himself from his friends, family, and their way of life, Ray embarks on a profound journey to discover something more meaningful and fulfilling.  In the tight-knit streets of Bay Ridge, the young man wrestles with the pull of his past and the uncertain promise of the future. As he grows older, memories of the life he’s built and the people he’s loved weigh heavy on him. Torn between staying grounded in his roots and stepping into the unknown, he must confront what it means to truly be ready to let go and move forward.
response.tagline: A love letter and break-up text to the place that shaped him
response.title: The Big Ready
